# <a name="organizing-your-outlookcom-mailbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="02f31-102">組織您的 Outlook.com 信箱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-102">Organizing your Outlook.com mailbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="02f31-103">連絡人清單是一群電子郵件地址，也很適合將電子郵件傳送給一群人。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-103">A contact list is a collection of email addresses, and is useful for sending email to a group of people.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="02f31-104">若要建立的連絡人清單：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-104">To create a contact list:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="02f31-105">移至[人員](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-105">Go to [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="02f31-106">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-106"></span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="02f31-107">在頁面頂端，選取 [箭號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-107">At the top of the page, select the arrow</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="02f31-108">下一步]**新增連絡人**] 和 [然後選取 [**新增連絡人清單**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-108">next to **New contact** and then select **New contact list**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="02f31-109">輸入的清單名稱，然後新增名稱或電子郵件地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-109">Enter a name for the list, and then add names or email addresses.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="02f31-110">請選取 [建立]\*\*\*\*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-110">Select **Create**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="02f31-111">深入了解如何[建立、 檢視及編輯連絡人和連絡人清單中 Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02f31-111">Learn more about how to [create, view, and edit contacts and contact lists in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
